sections.title: EA4 Studio Program
sections.subtitle: Tamkang University Department of Architecture
content_a: EA4 Studio Program was initiated in 1996 by Professors Chen Cheng-Chen and Cen Xin-Zhang. Inspired by the mentorship idea of the Bauhaus, a Studio introduced teaching groups with various guidance themes to advise students on diverse architectural design thinking tools.
content_b: This program provides senior architecture students professional skills to analyze the network connections between architecture, people, environment, and era from various perspectives, issues, or innovative technologies. This program expands students' understanding of architecture beyond traditional buildings through diverse perspective, and devoted to developing students' own individual aesthetic style.
content_c: There are over 15 topics in this program right now, includes spatial scene writing, sustainable environmental management, urban structure reading, design theory construction, digital technology manufacturing, future spatial construction, wooden structure creation, urban data mining, structural art form, and landscape urbanism.
sections.title_tw: 建築設計 教學研究室 計畫
content_a_tw: 本教學研究室計劃始於1996年，由陳珍誠老師和陳信樟老師共同開展。以包浩斯的師徒制工作方式作為藍本，通過引入不同指導主題的研究室教學群，為學生提供更加多元的建築設計思考工具。
content_b_tw: 本計畫旨在深化高年級建築學生的專業程度，透過不同領域、議題或嶄新技術的角度，重新審視建築與人、環境、時代的網絡連結關係，期待為學生帶來更多元的觀點，並提供整合、融會發展為個人風格的可能性。
content_c_tw: 目前研究室涵蓋的領域，包括空間場景寫作、永續環境經營、都市涵構閱讀、設計理論建構、數位科技製造、未來空間構造、木構形式創造、都市數據挖掘、構造藝術形式、景觀城市主義等議題
content_2: Introducing the Information Science and Computer Application Technology workshop, and learning the ways of obtaining and analyzing data.
Explore the concept of parameter, and address design challenges beyond the limitations of application instructions.
Introducing Visual Recognition and Mixture-Reality tools to transcript the information from surroundings and activities.
Considering how to apply digital data to Spatial Design Methodology.
Develop the ability of independent thinking with scientific recording, analysis, prediction, and verification.
sections.subtitle_2_tw: 智慧資訊建築教學研究室
content_2_tw: 加入資訊科學與計算機應用技術課程，建立學習數位資料的取得與分析方法。
超越應用程式的指令限制，針對設計議題，組織發展出具個人化的參數化技術使用流程。
引入視覺辨識技術與擴增實境工具，協助學員取得環境與活動的即時資訊。
思考如何將數據化的資訊應用到空間設計發展上。
培養獨立自主進行發現、紀錄、分析、預測、檢驗的資訊科學化空間設計方法。

advisors.name: Hsiao Chi-Fu
advisors.descript:
Study on Environment | Narrative | Media Carriers, Examines different Analogue | Digital information 
 
 Discuss the methods of utilizing digital tools, to Extract | Analyze | Translate | Derive and Calculations 
 
 Revise a DESIGN CODEBOOK that can be implemented in spatial context 
 Emphasis on Relationships | Translation Logic | Reproduction methods 
 
 Create a customized spatial design algorithm, and demonstrate it through spatial diagrams and models.
advisors.descript_tw:
研究 環境 | 敘事 | 媒材載體 當中 
 各種 類比 | 數位 資訊 
 
 探討使用數位工具 
 擷取 | 分析 | 轉譯 | 衍生運算 的技術 
 
 編輯一本 可被應用於 場域涵構當中 
 關聯性 | 轉譯邏輯 | 再現工法 的 設計手冊 
 
 發展出 具個人化風格 的 
 空間設計演算方法 
 並 通過 空間模型驗證呈現。

advisors.name: Yu Ying-Chang
advisors.descript:
Develop via Narrative Methods with Engineering and Technological Characteristics 
 
 Explore the exterme of Construction | Production | Material | Physics | Structural | Form 
 
 Corresponding to Perception | Behavior | Urban Regeneration | Digital Forms | Environmental Ecology 
 
 Create specific Typologies | Functional Prototype with innovative Atmospheres | Perceptual Experience.
advisors.descript_tw:
發展 具備工程科技特徵 的 設計敘事方法 
 
 藉由探討 構造方法 | 生產技術 | 材料科學 | 物理現象 | 構造形式 
 
 對應於 建築感知 | 空間行為 | 都市再生 | 數位型態 | 環控生態 
 
  針對特定 型式 | 機能原型 創造 革新的 空間氛圍 與 感知體驗。

advisors.name: Lin Chen-Ying
advisors.descript:
Vision the future of Architecture 
 
 In the contemporary trend of changes in social and space 
 Defining | Anticipating the future lifestyles that evolve with the times 
 
 Developing 3 different types of NORMAD FUTURE LIVES from S | M | L scale.
advisors.descript_tw:
探討建築的未來 
 
 在 社會空間條件 急劇變化的當代趨勢下 
 通過可用的 工具 | 創新思維 
 界定 | 預見  隨時代變動的未來生活模式 
 
 發展 小 | 中 | 大 3 種 不同 時空條件的 游居未來 與 空間。

advisors.name: Hideki Hirahara
advisors.descript:
Collect 3 favorite experiences of life 

 Create 3 keywords for the notation 

 Digitally design 3 architectures 

 Create 3 space models + graphic notation panels 

 Research and Development of your theory 

 Create your own THEORY BOOK in 29 x 29cm.
advisors.descript_tw:
收集 3 段人生經驗中最喜歡的經歷 

 定義 3 個可以進行空間譜記的關鍵字 

 發展 3 段數字化建築設計 

 製作 3 組空間模型 + 圖形譜記圖板 

 研究 並 開發 你的 個人理論 

 編寫一本屬於你自己的 建築理論。

advisors.name: Hong Shi-Hua
advisors.descript:
Investigate the potential of Intelligence Embedded Responsive System 

 Understand Biological Material Systems 

 Study the Biomimetics with Algorithmic Computational Modeling | Digital Simulation | Fabrication 

 Explore the Form Finding and Adapted for Climatic | Social context.
advisors.descript_tw:
探索 具智慧的 嵌入式 響應系統 在建築空間中的潛力 

 發展向生物學習的仿生材料系統 

 探究 基於 仿生學 的 演算建模 | 數位模擬 | 數位製造技術 

 研究 型式生成算法 並應用於 氣候 | 社會 涵構當中。

advisors.name: Chung Yu-Hua
advisors.descript:
Focus on Interactive Spatial Interface | Installations 
 
 Explore the Hybrid of Materials to create new spatial forms 
 
 Use Sensor to provide feedback on the relationship between Space and Behaviors 
 
 Study the dynamic relationship between Human | Nature | Interfaces | Space with Interactive Interface.
advisors.descript_tw:
發展 與行為互動的 空間介面裝置 
 
 探究 混和材料 與 創造 新的空間形式 
 
 藉由感測裝置 反饋 空間與使用行為關係 
 
 通過 互動介面 研究 人 | 自然 | 介面 | 空間 的 動態關係。

advisors.name: Cai Da-Ren
advisors.descript:
Observing the inherent existence construction in the city 
 
 Exploring the potential Positive | Negative Spaces in Archtecture Context 
 
 Build a Sanctuary in Physical | Spiritual in the city 
 
 Investigate Structure | Materials | Unique Atmosphere.
advisors.descript_tw:
觀察城市中 理所當然的 特殊存在 
 
 研究 建築學中 正 | 負 空間的可能性 
 
 創造出 肉體 | 精神 的 庇護所 
 
 探究 構造 | 材料 與 特殊空間氛圍  
 
 新 氛圍 | 機能 | 型態 置入涵構後 的 再思考。

advisors.name: Huang Ren-Jie
advisors.descript:
Focusing on the Application of Additive Manufacturing Technology 
 
 Refining the potential of Additive Manufacturing Technology in Material | Workflow | Fabrication | Generations | Interactive Design 
 
 Dedicated to creating new Construction Methods | Spatial Experiences | Design Approaches | Products | Life Style.
advisors.descript_tw:
著眼於層積製造技術應用 
 
 精煉 層積製造技術 應用於 材料 | 製程 | 組構 | 數位演算 | 互動行為  的潛力 
 
 致力於創造 新的 工法 | 空間經驗 | 設計方法 | 產品 | 生活模式。

advisors.name: Song Wei-Xiang
advisors.descript:
Issues from International Competitions, includes Local Lives | Cultural Characteristics | Environmental Conditions 

 Present original Proposals with a Sustainable Perspective 

 Arrange Design Process | Analysis | Necessary Description Drawings within restrict Pannels. 

 Address Spatial Design | Accessibility| Safety, | Environmental Impact Assessment.
advisors.descript_tw:
面對 在地生活 | 文化特質 | 環境天候 的 國際競圖 議題 

 提出 原創 | 具永續觀點 的 設計提案 

 在限定版面中 呈現 明確的 設計程序分析 

 回應 空間設計 | 可及性 | 安全性 | 環境影響評估。

advisors.name: Weng Wei-Chen
advisors.descript:
Schematic Contemporary Architectural Program 

 Extracting | Translating | Organizing the Spatial | Behavioral | Psychological Consciousness within the Context 
 
 Trans-Position Concepts | Re-Programming | Re-Structuring the existing Spatial | Social Context.
advisors.descript_tw:
拆解 特定 建築計畫概念 的時代意義 
 
 萃取 | 轉譯 | 組織 計畫中 的 空間 | 行為 | 心理 意識 
 
 通過 移置概念 | 再計畫 | 構造重組 重新擾動原有的空間涵構。

advisors.name: Chen Yo-Sheng
advisors.descript:
Starting from site measurement in the actual field 
 
 Using Materials | Tools | Techniques 
 
 Considering the Environmental Requirements | Human Scale | Site Conditions | Technical Limitations 
 
 Build a 2-meter Square Construction piece in REALITY.
advisors.descript_tw:
由測量開始，在實際場域上 
 
 真實 運用 各種 材料 | 工具 | 工法 
 
 考量 環境需求 | 身體尺度 | 基地條件 | 技術限制 
 
 製作一座 2公尺 見方 的 實構築 作品。

advisors.name: Lin Hon-Yui
advisors.descript:
Integrate Biophilia Design | Organic Architecture | Chinese Gardens in Architecture 
 
 Revise Personal Spatial Experience 
 
 Use Space | Behavior to Respond to Contemporary Psychological states between Urban Living | Harbor 
 
 Explore different scales of Urban | Life | Nature in contemporary livings.
advisors.descript_tw:
融合 親生命設計 | 有機建築 | 中國園林 
 
 基於設計者個人的空間經驗出發 
 
 思考如何使用 空間 | 行為 
 回應 當代的 城市住居 | 避風港 心理狀態 
 
 探討 城市 | 生活 | 自然 與 不同尺度的 當代生活模式。

approaches.name: Chen Qin-Yun
approaches.title: InMotion
approaches.descript_tw: 海龜保育特展の序章——加深觀者印象：空間改變情緒，情緒影響姿態，姿態操縱空間。
approaches.descript: Enhance the audience's impression in the prologue of the Sea Turtle Conservation Exhibition by altering the space, influencing emotions, and manipulating postures.

approaches.name: Chen Xin-You
approaches.title_tw: 基於交戰行為的場景設計
approaches.title: A Scenario Based on Fire Combat
approaches.descript_tw: 以作戰行為作為場景設計的切入點，先分析遊戲角色在場景中使用各種槍枝的行為，再平剖面設計對應場景物件，使場景更有利於特定槍枝作戰，達到交戰程度最大化。
approaches.descript: To design a scene that maximizes engagement, this study begins with analyzing the behavior of game characters using various firearms. From there, design corresponding scene objects on a planar level that are conducive to specific firearm combat. By using combat behavior as the starting point for scene design, you can create a more immersive experience for players.

approaches.name: Young Xing-Rou
approaches.title: Doggy Playground
approaches.descript_tw: 基於小狗的認知能力，發展適合於小狗遊戲的空間設計。
approaches.descript: Develop space design suitable for dog playground based on dogs' cognitive abilities.

approaches.name: Cheng Yung-Yan
approaches.title: The Anatomy of Structure
approaches.descript_tw: 利用不同出入口的人口流動場域分析發展皮層形式，再通過受力演算能夠支撐皮層的桁架結構。
approaches.descript: Analysis of particles flowing using different entrances and exits in urban to develop a skin surface, and then plan a structure system that can withstand the skin.

approaches.name: Wu Pei-Hsuan
approaches.title: The Emotional Plaette of Space
approaches.descript_tw: 不同情緒的人看空間都帶有不同的特色，通過第三人稱的視角，領略各種情緒所呈現的空間美學。
approaches.descript: Different emotions perceive spaces with distinct characteristics. Through a third-person perspective, one can appreciate the spatial aesthetics presented by various emotional states.

approaches.name: Chen Chao-Chin
approaches.title: Time After Day After Day
approaches.descript_tw: 透過懸疑小說來敘述時間軸對於不同角色之間場景與視角的變化，利用「伏筆」去探討時間的連續性與角色之間的交集，並將其套入到漁港空間中，透過黑鮪魚的卸貨流程說明不同人物之間的時間轉換與場景的流動。
approaches.descript: Design : Use suspense novels to narrate the changes in the timeline for scenes and perspectives between different characters. Use 'Foreshadowing' to explore the continuity of time and the intersection between characters, and incorporate it into the fishing port space.

approaches.name: Chu Pin-Rong
approaches.title: The Pulsation of the Tatun Volcano Group
approaches.descript_tw: 透過轉譯機制，抽離了「臺北滅城」的恐懼想像，重新詮釋人與火山的相互關係。
approaches.descript: Through a series of translation steps, I detach the fearful landscape of Taipei's Destruction, reinterpret the mutual relation between human & volcano.

approaches.name: Chang Chih-Han
approaches.title: Float with Wave
approaches.descript_tw: 藉由研究將海浪的特性和規則，得出其擾動的特性並將其轉化為空間，藉由此空間來擾動路徑、人為與自然的邊界效應。
approaches.descript: The wave interact with other wave and the sea floor,cause them to disturbance. In this design I capture this rule and recreate the movement of waves to a space ,so it can disturbance the boundary of route, space, or even a structure that separate people form nature.

approaches.name: Peng Yan-Ling
approaches.title: Crafting Diverse Spaces through Unit Composition
approaches.descript_tw: 藉由研究將海浪的特性和規則，得出其擾動的特性並將其轉化為空間，藉由此空間來擾動路徑、人為與由旋轉特性延伸發展可變動的單元，將其結合模組化形成多種可自由組織的空間樣態。
approaches.descript: Extending from the rotational characteristics, developing variable units, and combining them modularly to create a variety of freely configurable spatial patterns.

approaches.name: Lin Pei-Wen
approaches.title: Light, Path
approaches.descript_tw: 藉由基地的紋理與光線交織，畫作配合轉場變化，展現出新型式的淡水戶外美術館。
approaches.descript: By interweaving the texture and light at the site, and the paintings coordinating the transitions, I show a new type of Tamsui outdoor art museum.

approaches.name: Lin Wei-Jie
approaches.title: Water, Dance
approaches.descript_tw: 投影各種水的紋路以及人體偵測技術將畫面投影至現實環境，讓現實與虛擬在同個空間產生融合與對話。
approaches.descript: The projection of various water patterns and human detection technology project the images onto the real environment, creating a fusion and interaction between reality and virtuality within the same space.

approaches.name: Shiu An-Shiou
approaches.title: Worship Party
approaches.descript_tw: 面對老一代習俗的改變現在許多年輕人更注重於實際快速且能立竿見影的抒發層面而非單純依靠求神拜佛。我想創造出一種建構在尊崇傳統基礎上屬於新一代族群的祭拜方式。
approaches.descript: Due to the changing trend of the older generation, many young people nowadays prioritize practical, fast, and immediate ways of expressing themselves, rather than solely relying on seeking divine intervention. I aim to create a worship method that respects tradition while also appealing to the new generation.

approaches.name: Su Wan-Xia
approaches.title: The Reversal of Stable Space
approaches.descript_tw: 面對老一代習俗的改變現在許多年輕人更注重於實際快速且能立竿見影的抒發層面而非單純依靠求神拜佛。我想創造出一種建構在尊崇傳統基礎上屬於新一代族群的祭拜方式。
approaches.descript: Designing stable space through the life of a racehorse, the competition and confinement arising from stable space metaphorically represent a dystopian world.

approaches.name: Xie Xiao-Heng
approaches.title: Organism x Ruins Symbiosis S-structure
approaches.descript_tw: 基於榕樹的生長模式的觀察研究，建構一套基於起始點、目標點、感知環境規則的仿生演算方法，並配合結構檢驗工具與數據分析方法，找到一種可能被合理應用於數位構築技術上的有機構造設計方法。
approaches.descript: Based on observations on the growth pattern of banyan trees, a biomimetic algorithm method is developed in this study. This method takes into account the starting point, target point, and rules of the surrounding environment. By combining this method with structural inspection tools and data analysis methods, the goal is to discover a feasible organic structural design approach that can be implemented in digital construction technology.

approaches.name: Zhu Jun-Hao
approaches.title: Cloud Structure
approaches.descript_tw: 針對基地上使用者的活動，應對停留時間與人體尺度的關係，身體力行地以正交系統建構的木架構造物。
approaches.descript: Regarding the activity of the users on the base, we construct a wooden frame structure orthogonally, in response to the relationship between the dwell time and the human scale.

approaches.name: Lin Kuan-Fu
approaches.title: What if……
approaches.descript_tw: 在一個未來充滿危險的環境，在樹上的一個庇護所以及生存方式。
approaches.descript: Living in the tree shelter that can provide dangerous environment and live safety and sustainably.

approaches.name: Lin Peng-Yen
approaches.title: Instantaneous Bridge
approaches.descript_tw: 人的思考不斷地在自我、大眾、意識和資訊四個世界中循環。我們在這些世界中不斷學習、接收、傳達和創造，透過這些經驗來回移動，建立起那座不斷移動的瞬間的橋，連接未曾經歷之處。
approaches.descript: Human thought continuously cycles through the four worlds of self, public, consciousness, and information. We continuously learn, receive, communicate, and create within these worlds. Through these experiences, we move back and forth, building the ever-moving instantaneous bridge that connects us to uncharted territories.

approaches.name: Kao Jia-Ming
approaches.title_tw: 如果 i人能舒適地做自己...
approaches.title: If introverted persons can be themselves.
approaches.descript_tw: 在現行社會體制下，人們因各中因素，必須溝通交流，在此情況下，i行人個的人必須偽裝成e行人，因此，身為i行人的我才會提出這個設計假說，並利用人們隨處可見的機能：便利商店作為此次設計的program，並利用箇中設計手法，將各個program打散並隱藏在現有建築裡。
approaches.descript: In the current societal system, people must communicate and interact due to various factors. In this situation, individuals who belong to Group I must disguise themselves as Group E individuals. Therefore, as someone belonging to Group I, I propose this design hypothesis and utilize the ubiquitous convenience stores as the program for this design. Using this design approach, various programs will be dispersed and concealed within existing buildings.

approaches.name: Hsiung Hsing-Ying
approaches.title: Path of Enigma
approaches.descript_tw: 尋找各種迷失方向的方法，並結合新學習的技術，列舉並圖示化空間生成的邏輯，最後用此邏輯做出現實的生活空間。
approaches.descript: Explore various methods of navigating lost directions and incorporate newly learned techniques to enumerate and visualize the logic of spatial generation. Finally, use this logic to create real-life living spaces.

approaches.name: Lin Betty
approaches.title: CONNECT
approaches.descript_tw: 嘗試利用3d列印製造多適應性的家具，以隨手可得的竹筷作為桿件，設計出能夠接合竹筷的接頭，並以單元去拼湊出可使用的家具。
approaches.descript: I try to use 3D printing to create multi-adaptive furniture, using bamboo chopsticks at our fingertips as rods. Then, I design joints that can join the bamboo chopsticks, and piece together furniture from units.

approaches.name: Li Yi-Yun
approaches.title: Faith Calibration Institution
approaches.descript_tw: 我們存在在一個權力主導的世界，從以前的宗教信仰到如今的大數據以及人工智慧發展，權力只是從集中式的宗教被轉移到更接近我們身邊，此次設計以宗教與科技作為出發點，討論群體、系統、空間彼此關係的中心與去中心化。
approaches.descript: The world we live in is dominated by power, which has shifted from the centralized religious beliefs of the past to the realms of big data and artificial intelligence today. This design takes religion and technology as its starting point to discuss the centralization and decentralization of relationships among communities, systems, and spaces.

approaches.name: Shen Yu-Ting
approaches.title: l exist（House with/without a form）
approaches.descript_tw: 以基地概念為設計目標，目標體現建築的存在，從外面感受不到的存在，在進到建築的那一刻透過聲音和角度傳達存在的是甚麼？
approaches.descript: "Designing with the concept of a base as the goal, the aim is to embody the existence of the architecture. An existence not felt from the outside, but revealed the moment one enters the building through sound and angles—what is it that exists?"

approaches.name: Yang Cheng-You
approaches.title: House with [ without ] a form
approaches.descript_tw: 有長谷川豪的上尾の長屋中開始轉化其形式，並外顯出他原本內部的街，串聯空間的一條街，使他垂直化的同時，讓他擁有強烈的公共性
approaches.descript: In Go Hasegawa's "Nagayamon House in Ageo," he began transforming its form, making the originally internal street explicit. By linking the spaces with a street that becomes vertical, he imparts a strong sense of publicness to the design.

approaches.name: Lin Ting-Yu
approaches.title: GreenSource
approaches.descript_tw: 本項目位於新竹科學園區旁，以水資源收集和都市農業為核心，旨在改善周邊住宅區的水資源隱私過度、社會互動缺乏等問題，提升宜居性行走體驗和社區互動。
approaches.descript: Located next to Hsinchu Science Park, this project focuses on water resource collection and urban agriculture to address privacy concerns and social isolation in the surrounding residential areas, enhancing livability and community interaction.

approaches.name: Hsieh Xiao-Heng
approaches.title: Apocalypse's Regeneration Draftsss...
approaches.descript_tw: 本案旨在提出城市在面臨洪水時的一個自動化生成撤離居所的草案，本案基地位在雅加達，是一個即將面臨洪水而消失的城市，我透過參數化的方法分析城市建物布局，希望提出自動化生成的操作流程結合循環系統的設計，讓城市運用原有資源去面對洪水甚至轉化災害為本體的關鍵元素。
approaches.descript: This project aims to propose a draft for the automated generation of evacuation shelters in urban areas facing flooding. The site is located in Jakarta, a city on the verge of being submerged by floods. By utilizing parametric methods to analyze the layout of urban buildings, I hope to present an automated process combined with a cyclical system design. This will enable the city to utilize its existing resources to confront flooding and even transform the disaster into a critical element of the city's essence.
